name: Viewpoint 2064
description:
Viewpoint 2064 is a Shoot 'Em Up video game published by Sammy Studios released on November 17th, 2000 for the N64.

This cancelled game was supposed to be released around the year 2000 but never did, it leaked online on March 2020. It was supposed to be a sequel to "Viewpoint", an isometric Arcade game that was also released on many other systems, it looked like this in the NEO-GEO system.
